statements: DELETE FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_contact = '+123456789' AND lead_status = 'New';
DELETE FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_status = 'New' AND lead_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM incoming_leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website' AND lead_contact = '1234567890';
DELETE FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = 100 AND communication_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM Agents WHERE agent_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Communications WHERE lead_id = (SELECT lead_id FROM Leads WHERE lead_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM agent_assigned_leads WHERE agent_id = 1 AND lead_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 2004 AND log_type = 'Call';
